snippet: An attack on the Iranian ambassador’s residence in Sana, the Yemeni capital, killed at least three people.
abstract: Car bomb attack on residence of Iranian ambassador Hossain Niknam in Yemen kills at least three people; Twitter account associated with Al Qaeda in the Arabian Peninsula carries statement claiming responsibility.
lead_paragraph: An attack on the Iranian ambassador’s residence in Sana, the Yemeni capital, killed at least three people.

headline.main: Bombing in Yemen Targets Iranian Envoy’s Home

keywords.value: Al Qaeda in the Arabian Peninsula
keywords.name: organizations
